class about.models.Thoughts(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This module is for the admin of the site to add his/her thoughts. These thoughts will then get published on the site.

Parameters:

  • title – String representation of post-title

  • body – String representation of post-body

  • created-at – DateTime representation of when post was created

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

about.views.join_us(request)[source]

This function is for new users wanting to sign up

Parameters:

  • form – Creates new user

  • form.save – saves new user to database

  • form.is_valid – Checks for user validation

Returns:

Returns html to thank user for registering, or returns register.html for re-registration

Return type:

HttpResponse

about.views.logged_in(request)[source]

This function renders the logged_in.html, if user login was successfull

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – Httprequest object, representing current request

Returns:

Returns logged_in.html page if user is successfully logged in

Return type:

HttpResponse

about.views.login(request)[source]

This function provides users with the option to log in, in order to access more on the site

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – HttpResponse object returning request

Returns:

if user is logged in, redirects to about.html. If wrong input, login.html is reloaded. else. user is directed to login.html

Return type:

HttpResponse

about.views.thoughts(request)[source]

This function renders the thought page, cantaining all the hought-posts added by admin

Parameters:

  • thoughts – Returns thoughts in chronological order

  • if.request.user.is_authenticated – Checks if user is logged in before being able to access the page

Returns:

thoughts.html if user is authenticated, otherwise not_logged_in.html if usern isn’t

Return type:

HttpResponse
